channel.title: No Chapter Titles FIX
channel.description:
[FONT='Arial Black']I Had A Problem when i go to a chapter it appears #BMS Chapter Title and stuff but now I fixed it![/FONT] [FONT='Arial Black']Go to scripts find the titles notepad and find the title change it to the right title (or your own title if you want) and then the #GAMEOVER_CREDITS you can also change them like this:[/FONT]
GAMEOVER_CREDITS { Subject: Freeman Assignment: Postponed Reason: Currently Awaiting further data }
[FONT='Arial Black']Or what you want.[/FONT] [FONT='Arial Black']Well that is all! Hope it helps.[/FONT]
[b]Edit: It only appears in-game and not im main menu (New Game)[/b]

item.title: No Chapter Titles FIX

item.description:
This usually happens if you name game folder something other than “bms”.

item.title: No Chapter Titles FIX

item.description:
What causes this bug, I’ve never had it and I’ve played through multiple times.
Are you attempting to play on Linux or did yo just extract the game to an improper folder?.

Read full topic

item.title: No Chapter Titles FIX
item.dc:creator: Carlos091
item.description:
I Had A Problem when i go to a chapter it appears #BMS Chapter Title and stuff but now I fixed it!
Go to scripts find the titles notepad and find the title change it to the right title (or your own title if you want) and then the #GAMEOVER_CREDITS you can also change them like this:

GAMEOVER_CREDITS
{
Subject: Freeman
Assignment: Postponed
Reason: Currently Awaiting further data
}

Or what you want.
Well that is all! Hope it helps.

Edit: It only appears in-game and not im main menu (New Game)

Read full topic
